data.name: RPGScenery - Log Fort Scene
data.detailed_description:
The log fortress was built from the forest's trees on an artificial clearing, which is well reflected in the multitude of trunks surrounding the fort. Not far from the gate, a small camp has formed for the passers-by. Behind the walls hides a dozen tents and a large log house, providing accommodation to about 30 people. Wooden barricades protect the fortification. In the event of an attack, defenders can defend their homes from the wall-walks.

This DLC contains 7 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
